data.actual_result: If entering from the bottom, the tooltip continues to display when you aren't hovering over the button.
data.expected_result: The tooltip should disappear when you are no longer hovering over the button.
data.short_description: If you hover over the "Play on Spotify" button on your own profile from the bottom (see gif) the Spotify "You played yourself" tooltip stays up.
data.steps_to_repro: - Listen to Spotify - Go to your own profile and hover over the "Play on Spotify" button coming in from the bottom - Observe how the tooltip stays up - Observe how if you enter from the top or sides it does not stay up
